articles.title: Killing of Buhlungu's bodyguard prompts prominent reaction - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: A group of prominent South Africans is calling for action to be taken against looters and destroyers at the University of Fort Hare (UFH) after the killing of vice-chancellor Prof Sakhela Buhlungu's bodyguard, Mboneli Vesele.
